nodes.text: Titan Base was a Rebel Alliance starfighter outpost. It was in a subterranean cavern on an uninhabited planet in the Corva sector. The base consisted of a command center, the hangar, barracks, and a weapons range. It was home to Nightmare Squadron, which primarily operated in nearby sectors, and an Alliance Special Operations team.
Shortly after the Battle of Yavin, a team of operatives were briefed there for a key mission to stop the Galactic Empire's Project: Shell-cracker.
Titan Base appears in "Operation: Shell Game," the adventure in Fantasy Flight Games' Star Wars: Age of Rebellion Beta, released at Gen Con Game Fair in 2013.
